verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker chipotle beef] carnitas i came up with this recipe while trying to figure out what i could do with a pot roast that had been in the freezer now i keep the rub in a plastic bag ready and waiting in my cupboard and i can get the roast in the slow cooker in less than 15 minutes —ann piscitelli nokomis florida cook
